loggers.defined

Class PenaltiesLogger

  • java.lang.Object
    • loggers.ManualLogger
      • loggers.defined.PenaltiesLogger

  • public class PenaltiesLogger
extends ManualLogger
    PenaltiesLogger is a logger which keeps track of all registered penalties during single re-rankings. At desired intervals, it will poll all registered penalty functions and print the current score to a log file.
    Since:
    0.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Joeri Ruyssinck (joeri.ruysssinck@intec.ugent.be)
